info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:27PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lunenburg, Nottoway and northwestern Dinwiddie Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1026 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crewe to 6 miles south of Burkeville to near Green Bay. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Crewe around 1030 PM EDT. Nottoway and Spainville around 1040 PM EDT. Wilsons around 1045 PM EDT. Blackstone around 1050 PM EDT. Fort Barfoot around 1110 PM EDT. Sutherland around 1115 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include North Wellville, Irby, Ammon, Murdocks, Forkland, Nutbush, Darvills, The Falls, Center Star and Church Road. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
